channel.title: CVE Feed for ITarian -- ITarian SaaS platform / on-premise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ITarian -- ITarian SaaS platform / on-premise

item.title: CVE-2022-25151|2024-08-06T12:32:38.901Z -- itarian -- itarian%20saas%20platform%20%2F%20on-premise
item.description: Within the Service Desk module of the ITarian platform (SAAS and on-premise), a remote attacker can obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTP Only flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to the management interface by using this vulnerability in combination with a successful Cross-Site Scripting attack on a user.
